titleStmt.title: Annotations on Milton's Paradise lost wherein the texts of sacred writ, relating to the poem, are quoted, the parallel places and imitations of the most excellent Homer and Virgil, cited and compared, all the obscure parts by P.H. ...
titleStmt.author: Hume, Patrick, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Written by Patrick Hume. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
